androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Enable padding data (pd)
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: This might be able to against traffic analysis. Make sure you also enabled this option in server side

androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.app:title: Disable server verify (no-verify)
androidx.preference.CheckBoxPreference.app:summary: Client won't verify the server's certificate chain and host name. In this mode, TLS is susceptible to man-in-the-middle attacks. This should be used only for testing without -n and -cca.
